description: [Ethiopian Herald] Leaders of Africa and China are meeting in Beijing to map out China-Africa future development cooperation. Africa has started to implement the second 10-year plan of Agenda 2063 that envisages elevating every AU Member State at least to a Middle-Income Status which makes this year's FOCAC Summit timelier than its predecessors.
title: Africa: Focac 2024 - Furthering the Opportunity to Rise Together

description: [Ethiopian Herald] The United Nations Economic Commission for Africa (ECA), the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) and the African Union Commission, jointly announced the continent Africa needs urgent and increased investment in climate adaptation and resilience.
title: Africa: Climate - ECA Reveals Africa Loses Up to 5 Percent of GDP

description: [Ethiopian Herald] In the last few years, there have been various platforms devised to deepen ties and strengthen cooperation with the African states.
title: Africa: Envisioning a More Just, Equitable World Order

description: [New Dawn] Chinese President Xi Jinping opened this year's FOCAO with a renewed vow for a robust China-Africa friendship despite changing global trends.
title: Africa: China Vows Robust Friendship With Africa.

description: [Prosper Africa] Washington, D.C., -- Since the start of the Biden-Harris Administration in January 2021, the U.S. government, through the Prosper Africa Initiative, has closed 1,695 deals valued at $63.5 billion in 41 African countries. In the calendar year 2021, at the start of the Biden-Harris Administration, the U.S. Government facilitated 262 deals valued at $3.1 billion. Just in the last six months of 2024, the U.S. Government facilitated 401 deals valued at $32.5 billion, indicating a significant increase in economic engagement between
title: Africa: New Data Shows Significant Growth in U.S. - Africa Trade and Investment Engagement

description: [UN News] Joint efforts by China and Africa can spark new momentum for development on the continent, UN Secretary-General António Guterres said on Friday, at a high-level meeting in Beijing.
title: Africa: Guterres Underlines Support for China-Africa Partnership

description: [Ethiopian Herald] Due to its significant potential for growth on both sides, the continent has gained increased attention from the global community. In particular, the need for robust bilateral interaction between the youth continent and the rest of the world has grown over time.
title: Africa: From Donation to Cooperation - Redefining Ties With Africa

description: [Ethiopian Herald] "In 2013, after Xi Jinping became Chinese President, he visited Africa for his first foreign visit and announced the principles of sincerity, real results, amity and good faith as China's Africa policy" said Ambassador of China to AU Hu Changchun.
title: Africa: Focac - a Platform to Invigorate Strong China-Africa Ties

description: [MAP] Beijing -- The Forum on China-Africa Cooperation (FOCAC) Summit opened on Thursday at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, with the participation of Chinese President Xi Jinping and African Heads of State and Government, including Morocco.
title: Africa: Forum On China-Africa Cooperation Summit Kicks Off in Beijing With Moroccan Participation

description: [SAnews.gov.za] President Cyril Ramaphosa has welcomed the proposal by Chinese President Xi Jinping to elevate China's bilateral relations with African countries which have diplomatic ties with China, to the level of strategic relations.
title: Africa: China Looks to Elevate Relations With African Countries

description: [ENA] Addis Ababa, -- China has announced partnerships in ten areas of cooperation with Africa, including trade, industrial cooperation, health, agriculture, connectivity, green development, and security.
title: Africa: China Announces Partnerships in Ten Areas of Cooperation With Africa

description: [SANF] As Beijing prepares to host the 2024 Summit of the Forum on China Africa Cooperation (FOCAC), I reflect on issues of possible interest to the Chinese investor with focus on Africa in general and Zimbabwe in particular. I discuss how Zimbabwe and the continent of Africa can leverage on opportunities presented by the dual planks of FOCAC and the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI). Zimbabwe is a country with enormous potential that has been suppressed by over 20 years of Western sanctions but is now rising as a
title: Africa: Focac 2024 Presents Opportunities for Expanding China-Africa Cooperation

description: [Independent (Kampala)] Kigali -- The Alliance for a Green Revolution in Africa (AGRA) has launched its 2024 Africa Agriculture Status Report that highlights the transformative role of micro, small, and medium-sized enterprises (MSMEs) in shaping Africa's agrifood landscape. It is titled "Harnessing the Private Sector for Food Systems Transformation in Africa."
title: Africa: Agra 2024 Report Out - Harnessing the Private Sector for Food Systems Transformation in Africa

description: [SANF] As Beijing hosts the 2024 Summit of the Forum on China Africa Cooperation (FOCAC), I continue to share my insights, from a southern African perspective, on the great diplomacy and intellectual project of our time. In this second in a series of articles on FOCAC 2024, I look at the significance of the China Africa cooperation framework, what it has achieved, and how Africa can leverage synergies for its development agenda.
title: Africa: China -Africa Forum More Than Just Diplomacy - Modernisation Top On the Agenda

description: [New Times] President Paul Kagame on Thursday, September 5, joined leaders from the continent and from China for the opening ceremony of the 2024 Forum on China-Africa Cooperation (FOCAC) Summit at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.
title: Africa: Kagame Joins Africa, China Leaders in 2024 Focac Summit Opening Ceremony

description: [RFI] President Xi Jinping has pledged to increase China's support to the African continent with nearly $51 billion in new funding, backing for more infrastructure initiatives and a promise to create at least 1 million jobs.
title: Africa: China Pledges to Give Africa $51 Bn in Fresh Funding Over Next Three Years

description: [allAfrica] Cape Town, South Africa -- In recognition of the potential of Africa's creative industries, Prosper Africa strives to harness these sectors for job creation and sustainable development.
title: Africa: U.S. Initiative Aims to Fuel Job Growth in African Creative Industries

description: [allAfrica] A "unprecedented" spike in mpox cases has been reported in 15 countries since January 2024.
title: Africa: Mpox Outbreak Exposes Need for Robust Global Vaccine Distribution

description: [UN News] A migrant shipwreck in the Mediterranean left another 21 missing off the island of Lampedusa, between the African coast and Malta, an Italian coast guard said on Wednesday.
title: Africa: Migrant Shipwreck Leaves 21 More Missing Off Coast of Lampedusa

description: [CFR] Despite a summer of protests, African leaders are doubling down on the status quo.
title: Africa: Ruling Parties Gear Up for Coming Elections

description: [New Times] The International Vaccine Institute (IVI), in collaboration with the University of Rwanda, has organised a five-day International Vaccinology Course, taking place simultaneously in Kigali, Rwanda; Seoul, Korea; and Stockholm, Sweden, from September 2 to September 6.
title: Africa: Kigali - First-Ever International Vaccine Institute Vaccinology Course in Africa Kicks Off

description: [This Day] * Holds bilateral meeting with Chinese Premier, Li Qiang
title: Africa: Tinubu - Africa Has Huge Potentials for Investments, Growth and Development

description: [Daily Trust] Immediate steps should be taken for the inclusion of women to achieve gender parity in Nigeria and beyond to avoid a tortuous distance of an average of 130 years, country director of Plan International Nigeria, Charles Usie, has advised.
title: Africa: It Will Take 130 Years to Achieve Gender Parity - World Economic Forum

description: [WHO] The World Health Organization (WHO) has published global cholera statistics for 2023, showing an increase in cases and deaths.
title: Africa: Data Show Marked Increase in Annual Cholera Deaths

description: [VOA] China's President Xi Jinping and his wife, Peng Liyuan, hosted a lavish banquet Wednesday for more than two dozen African leaders, kicking off the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation (FOCAC) in Beijing.
title: Africa: African Leaders Gather in Beijing for Summit

description: [VOA] Addis Ababa, Ethiopia / Washington -- China has been establishing closer cooperation with Africa, a relationship some view as fraught with debt burden while others hail as Africa leveraging its strategic importance globally.
title: Africa: Africa Needs Strategic, Disciplined Approach With China, Experts Say

description: [Business Day Africa] African airlines experienced a 6.2 percent year-on-year increase in air cargo demand in July, marking the lowest growth rate among all regions and their weakest performance in 2024, according to the latest data from the International Air Transport Association (IATA).
title: Africa: African Airlines Record Weakest Air Cargo Growth in 2024

description: [UN News] The number of deaths caused by cholera is on the rise, according to global cholera statistics for 2023 published by the World Health Organization (WHO) on Wednesday.
title: Africa: Who Reports 71 Per Cent Rise in Cholera Deaths Last Year
